description: This file defines a React component named `Sidebar` used for rendering a collapsible, sticky sidebar navigation with support for flat or grouped categories. It handles user interactions such as selecting categories/items, updating the URL, and responsive display adjustments for mobile and desktop.

methods.name: Sidebar({ title = "Categories", categories = [], onSelect })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a sidebar with categories, handling toggle, selection, and responsiveness.

ctags.name: Sidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Sidebar({ title = "Categories", categories = [], onSelect }) {$/

ctags.name:
w-72 bg-white border-r border-gray-200 z-30 transition-transform ease-gentle
        md:translate-x-0
        md:sticky md:top-16
        md:h-[calc(100vh-4rem)]
        fixed top-16 bottom-0
        ${open ? "translate-x-0" : "-translate-x-full md:translate-x-0"}
